nodes.text: A Force hunter was a type of bounty hunter.

A Force hunter was a specialized bounty hunter that hunted Force-sensitive individuals. Considered to be one of the most dangerous specializations a bounty hunter can ply, Force hunters were renowned for the training they underwent to ply their trade; mental training rendered them considerably harder to find in the Force, with a conditioned mind that allowed for a higher resistance to mind-affecting Force powers and tricks. Additionally, Force hunters trained in precision fire - techniques that allowed for carefully timed shots that compensated for a Force-users ability to block and reflect shots.
